short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Submit any URL to Hacker News. Click the icon, make any desired edits, and submit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly submit any url to Hacker News. 

Simply click the extension when on the page you want to share. A new tab will open to the submit page on Hacker News with prefilled information.
